column4: Hello.  I just installed some updates on my 11.04, and the @ every web that has flash it says "flash is not installed".  I tried removing it from Ubuntu software center and installing it again, and it keeps saying taht I don't have flash.  Any thoughts?
I can see it checked in the repo
> from which source do u install it?
I did this in terminal : sudo apt-get install flashplugin-installer
flashplugin-installer is already the newest version.
> maybe u can install from paa
ppa ok... I will look into that
it's really weird. Everything has been working fine since I first installed it
but today I installed some updates and the flash is gone
> good luck,,, btw, i prefered use ppa than standard repo
> coz it more update than else
